references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it introduces Mip-NeRF 360, a significant advancement in NeRF technology that addresses the limitations of previous NeRF methods.

references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs), a crucial concept in the field of 3D scene reconstruction and a major influence on the current work.

references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting (3DGS), which is the core method extended by the current work, making it fundamentally important.

references.paper_title: NeRF in the Wild: Neural radiance fields for unconstrained photo collections
references.reason: This is a key reference as it addresses the challenges of applying NeRFs to real-world, unconstrained scenes, a problem also tackled by the current work.

references.paper_title: NeRF On-the-go: Exploiting uncertainty for distractor-free nerfs in the wild
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on handling occlusions and appearance changes in real-world scenes using uncertainty modeling, a key technique also used in this work.
